snippet.title: (Ape Escape) Intro
snippet.description:
The intro cutscene for Ape Escape.

Ah, Ape Escape, you have entertained me for years with your murdering monkeys with lightsabers themed fun. I just wish Million Monkeys would be released here in the US. =[

Don't worry, Sonic fans. Shadow the Hedgehog will be coming next month. And boy is it going to be a jerkface to get done. CURSE YOU, SHADOW, AND YOUR ADDICTIVELY AWESOME MULTIPLE PATHWAY SYSTEM!
